• 10 things you as a developer should know today – new rules.
  • admin_data plugin – this plugin allows you to not only browse the records but also do quick and advance search on all of your tables.
  • Infinite page plugin for rails – unobtrusive and will_paginate reliant, neat.
  • a JQuery datagrid rails plugin – cool.
  • has_remote plugin – onnect your local model to a remote resource using ActiveResource, to make it look for certain attributes remotely. Caching and syncing is built in. scares me a little bit.
  • Remote require gem – Require a ruby file/gem from a remote location (url).
  • Rack:Debug – a rack middleware for step debugging.
  • Free Programming books – there’s even a ruby section, although i am not sure that it’s not a violation of rights, if someone knows better, please let me know and i’ll remove this link.
  • IRB commands – TOTALLY AWESOME.
  • Rails 3 screencasts and books – something tells me that the first book will be on hold for a while.
  • Tiny Photoshop replacements you can keep on your USB – well OK… not photoshop but it’s still a list of handy image editors.
  • Mozilla Prism – Use webapps as desktop applications.
  • The entrepreneur essentials list – absolutely IMPORTANT, awesome list.
